alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 22 at 4:36AM MDT until October 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow. Outdoor recreation will also be hazardous to those caught unprepared for winter conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
